description:
28L : Suitable for large families
1 year standard warranty on Product, 10 years warranty on ceramic enamel cavity
Slim Fry - Enjoy healthier fried food without using a deep fat fryer. Slim Fry technology circulates hot air that envelops food, so it is cooked crispy outside and juicy inside using only a touch of oil. As well as eliminating excess fat it also means that there are no greasy pans or hot oil splatters!
Sensor Cook- Serve perfectly cooked meals every time. With a push of a button Sensor Cook senses the interior air humidity and automatically adjusts the cooking mode and time to retain the natural texture and flavor of ingredients. So you can prepare delicious vegetables, chicken, pasta and more with ease.
Turntable On/Off - Experience greater flexibility whatever you are cooking. You have an option to disable the turntable, stopping the tray’s rotation. It means that every inch of interior space can be utilized as you can fit in any shape of dish. So you can easily heat large or square-shaped pans and casseroles.
